summary: Talking customizable relationships and sex in gaming...
title: Talking customizable relationships and sex in gaming...
body:
Wow! That title is a mouth full. Hopefully, the image redirected your attention back to my theme. To be honest, that is a loaded statement, and no it is not intended to be able to female perched upon a rooftop. So…….let’s talk gaming. And sex. Definitely sex, because who doesn’t like talking about that?! 

“Cyberpunk 2077. Guess what!!! Takes place in the distant future; the year is 2077. Whoa. Amazing. Incredible. Who woulda guessed.”

                                       - LevelUpMajor, 2018

To be honest, I can only be sarcastic for so long; so on a serious note, the customization in games these days is lacking and equally disappointing. Yes, we have the ability to choose our sex, skin colour, and clothing. Big deal, I do that in real life (joking). But the emotional bond between you and your persona that you are creating is seriously not there. I’m excited to see where Cyberpunk 2077 is going to take us from customization of body modification to choosing your sexuality and actually having sex with whomever you want. Gay. Bi. Or goddamn heterosexual NatGeo style banging.

If you can’t tell I’m excited about the game, I’m excited for the game to release so I can hack, fuck, and have some good old RPG fun. Follow me on Twitter to see my daily random thoughts on gaming and why I’m having an existential crisis.
